lines.Line:

naked! It was like torture
Y'know if we ever go to war and you’re captured, you’re in for a big surprise

It just keeps getting worse and worse! Y'know? I mean it’s bad
enough that I’m in love with my roommates girlfriend—which by the way, I think
she knows. Because every time we’re in the room together there’s this weird like
energy between us. And call me crazy, but I think she likes me too. And now I have seen
her naked. I mean at least when I’ve seen her with clothes on, I could imagine her
body was like covered in boles or something. But there are no boles, she’s smooth!
Smooth! (leaves
Wow! Could everyone totally see up his robe

lines.Line: (singing) "Little, tiny Tarzan, swinging on a nose hair. Swinging with the greatest of ease…" Darn it! Now, I don’t know who to get to the next verse

Yeah, ooh, I like that! Yeah. Wait! How do you know about

Well umm, y’know, I used to play
Well umm, y’know, I used to play
Oh yeah, that’s right, the keyboards, huh

Yeah, just a little in high school, but then I really got into it in
college. I mean that’s-that’s when I really found my sound

Oh God! Orange juice just came out of my nose, but it was totally worth

Really? No. I mean, nah, I haven’t played in so long, and-and, well
it’s-it’s really personal stuff, y’know
Come on, play that funky music white boy

No, you guys, I mean my keyboards are all the way up in—No, yeah,

lines.Character: [Cut to later that same day, Ross has retrieved his keyboard and is about to debut,

lines.Line: All right! Bring it on, you

Here we go. (Plays one note) Y’know, I’ve-I’ve never played
my stuff for anyone before, so it’s important that-that you understand it’s
about communicating very private emotions. (Plays another note) Y’know, umm, you

I’m

lines.Character:
(Ross starts to play. He plays a key that has a back beat sound attached to it. Over
the background music he plays the sound of a barking dog, a mooing cow, a laser beam,
someone coughing, a jackhammer, a doorbell, a police siren, a ray gun, breaking dishes,
and for a closer he plays the sound of a loud crash. Basically, the music sucks
lines.Line:
Ross starts to play. He plays a key that has a back beat sound attached to it. Over
the background music he plays the sound of a barking dog, a mooing cow, a laser beam,
someone coughing, a jackhammer, a doorbell, a police siren, a ray gun, breaking dishes,
and for a closer he plays the sound of a loud crash. Basically, the music sucks.
(At a loss for words) Boy, that was-that was, umm… terrific
Yeah, I mean, you should play in public

Wow! Thanks, you guys. That’s uh—ohhh, I wanna, I wanna play you
another piece! Umm! Uh-oh! I left my uh, helicopter sounds on another disk. I’ll be
right back! Okay? (Runs to fetch them) This is so nice, I’m—I am so…
(starts to break up and leaves
Oh God bless my dad sound proofing the basement
Oh God bless my dad sound proofing the basement
Oh, I can’t believe I ever let him touch me with those fingers

What are you guys talking about, I loved it! It was soo moving. Oh, plus
it’s just, it’s so different from the stuff you usually hear

3.SceneDescription:
Chandler and Joey's, continued from earlier. Chandler and Kathy are still
kissing, then they stop suddenly.

lines.Line: No-no-no-no, this is bad! It’s bad! This is bad
Wait the uh, the kiss or the situation
Ooh! Yes! Okay! Here’s what we do, we-we forget it happened

Okay, we-we swallow our feelings. Even if it means we’re unhappy
forever. Sound good
I have to; he’s my best friend, and you’re seeing him
Chandler, I like Joey a lot, but with you
Chandler, I like Joey a lot, but with you

(interrupting) Oh-no-no-no! Don’t! Don’t! See-see,
you’re getting me confused, I’m starting to urn.
I’m sorry. If you wanna pretend that nothing happened, I can try

Bye. (Kathy leaves and Chandler wonders over to and leans up against
the door.) Are you still out there
(outside the door) No. (Chandler opens the door and they kiss again.

4.SceneDescription:
Chandler and Joey's, Joey is opening the door, but Chandler has the chain on

lines.Line:
Aww man! I can’t believe I locked myself out again! (He knocks on the
door.

Hang on buddy! (He goes over and unlocks the door and opens it to
reveal a fully furnished apartment.
(rushing in) Oh my God! What happened here? Did you do all this

Well, I just thought it’d make me feel good to do something nice
for my friend
Oh no-no-no. This is amazing. (He goes over and presses a button on a remote control that opens the entertainment center doors revealing the TV.

(very excited) A TV as if it appears from nowhere! That’s the dream!
Man, how did you afford this stuff
Well, y’know I’m 29. I mean who needs a savings account
Well, y’know I’m 29. I mean who needs a savings account
Oh, you are the best friends anyone has ever had

Oh-no-no-no, you are! You do this, you give me the great advice, and hey
listen, I was thinking about what you said yesterday about focusing on one woman, I’m
gonna do that

No-no-no, I think I’m gonna see how things go with Kathy. She’s
pretty cool

Y’know what I think? I think somebody’s got a little crush on
Casey. How ‘bout I fix you two up? What do you think
That all the pieces of my life are falling right into place

lines.Line: Hey Chandler! Saw the new furniture. Very nice
Yeah! Joey has the best boyfriend ever
No. Is there anyway, anyway you think he’ll understand this

You obviously haven’t screwed over a lot of your friends. (They all
look at her) Which we all appreciate

No the-the sad thing is, if you had told him how you felt before you
kissed her, knowing Joey, he probably just would’ve just stepped aside

Oh, don’t say that! Don’t say that. That’s not true. Is
it

Oh, don’t say that! Don’t say that. That’s not true. Is
it
Then why didn’t you tell me to do that?!
Well, I said-I said something to Phoebe
Well, I said-I said something to Phoebe
Yeah! No, that’s right. And I thought it was a really good idea
God!! (Sits down in disgust.) What am I gonna do?
Well, Chandler, you’re gonna have to tell him
Why?! Why do I have to tell him?
Why?! Why do I have to tell him?
Hey, would it be okay if I wrote a song about this

Central Perk, Ross is playing his music. Monica, Phoebe, and Rachel are sitting

lines.Line: Oh my God, he’s lost it. He’s totally lost it
Phoebe, his music could not get any worse. There are rats in the basement that are hanging themselves

set

After that? Yeah! No, I mean if I can help
